synopsis.text: While navigating the complexities of marriage, Azu, a 30-year-old stay-at-home mom and nail salon owner, grapples with the feeling that her husband, Junpei, no longer cherishes her as he once did. Despite her growing frustration, she perseveres with their child and the daily routine. However, her life takes an unexpected turn when a mysterious customer at her salon reveals a captivating secret on her phone. Soon after, an anonymous message plunges Azu and Junpei's relationship into chaos. Penned by Yukari Koyama, the creative mind behind 'Rose-Colored Crusade', this original work invites you to delve into a gripping tale of temptation, deceit, and heartbreak among four married individuals, ultimately revealing a profound exploration of love and its trials.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
